title: My Cat And I Both Like You - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Devoted Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   Proactive Protagonist   Showbiz   Time Travel
author: 雨田君
description:
Qu Mingnan, a third-rate director.

Qin Suiyi, a popular movie emperor.

They were supposed to be people from two different worlds, but because of an accident-

“I am your son from the future.”

“…Whose son, mine and?”

“Qin Suiyi.”

“Who gave birth to you??? How do I remember that I don’t seem to have that function? No, Qin Suiyi doesn’t have that function, right… No, how do I remember that I seem to be a straight man?”

“In order to become an internationally renowned director, please regard this marriage as an important matter and pursue my dad !”>
